alert.note: Alert for Bailey; Cochran; Hale; Hockley; Lamb; Lubbock; Lynn; Terry; Yoakum (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued February 26 at 12:13AM CST until February 26 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Lubbock
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON CST TODAY THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. For the High Wind Watch, west winds 35 to 50 mph with gusts up to 75 mph possible. * WHERE...Central and western portions of the South Plains. * WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 9 AM CST this morning. For the High Wind Watch, from Noon CST today through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous overnight into Sunday morning. High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages Sunday afternoon and evening. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Bailey; Cochran; Hale; Hockley; Lamb; Lubbock; Lynn; Terry; Yoakum
